com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.interfaces

Interface OrderDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderDaoImpl

    public interface OrderDao
    OrderDao is an Interface class which has all the methods to query the orders table in the Database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
